website_summaries.verdict: If you're just looking for a basic surge protector, avoid the i-Bright. But for consumers looking to get a lot of mileage out of their technology, this surge protector's flexibility and versatility set it apart.
pros: The i-Bright boasts a sharp design and a feature-rich interface, along with an impressive base performance
cons: Setting up and scheduling can be a pain, and the price is too high for many casual consumers

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT GET IF YOU ARE A COMPETENT USER WHO WANTS CONTROL OVER THIS.  REQUIRES CLOUD-BASED MANAGEMENT SYSTEM.  INSANELY INSECURE.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Its screenshots imply that it exposes its own web server for control,but it requires a trash combination of cloud-based services and Java applications. This should not be any harder than an embedded web control that I can access by going to an IP and port on my network - not this ridiculous proprietary crap. It's ironic that "smart" controls all seem to use the stupidest technology possible. Shame on the idiot designers.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Goodstuff

customer_reviews.title: Defunct Business
customer_reviews.text: The app has been removed from the app store. The links are dead links on the website. There is absolutely no way to get the necessary software for the smart power strip making the item nothing but a glorified power strip. I was very excited about this item and very disappointed after receiving it and finding the software or app is no longer available. The company seems to be defunct and they are simply trying to offload their inventory.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Brogan

customer_reviews.title: You are on your own when you buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: Product works great!!!! Don't expect any technical help from the company. They don't respond and the phone number on their website has been wrong for months.
customer_reviews.author: alang

customer_reviews.title: this is an absolute waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have had to reset the settings a few times when switching over to a new Wi-Fi network. THIS IS AN ABSOLUTE NIGHTMARE TO SET UP. For the expensive price, this is an absolute waste of money. There are much cheaper and much easier versions out there.
customer_reviews.author: Drew B.

customer_reviews.title: Unable to get this to work.  You must be super computer man I guess.
customer_reviews.text: Multiple pages of directions. Could not get it to find my wifi and sync. Unable to use this but haven't had time to return it yet. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!! Wifi setup is hard/impossible ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy!!! Wifi setup is hard/impossible to setup. Need todo 100 steps for a simple wifi connection and configuration. Buy other brand
customer_reviews.author: Concern Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Way to Reduce Energy Consumption
customer_reviews.text: I’m always going out of town and I wanted to find a way that I could reduce stand by power without having to unplug my electronics every time I left for a trip. The product is also great for those times where you are unsure if things were left on after rushing out of the house or coming home late at night and being able to turn on lights before walking through the door. Everything can be controlled by the app. Great product for saving some money on my electricity bill too!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Solich

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It was very hard to find the software to work with this power strip.
customer_reviews.author: tim kuiken

customer_reviews.title: This is the most amazing product. Control your home energy systems and obtain ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing product. Control your home energy systems and obtain a wifi access point for less than $120? Ridiculous value? The access point alone (providing wifi internet up to 200 meters). Is worth $250 by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t set up an account with the company or download the app.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t download or find an app on the App Store as the instructions say to do. Can’t set up an account on my Google like the instructions say to do. No contact information on the instructions. I have found an email address online don’t know if it’s any good waiting for a response to my questions. Not a happy camper. Just have a $10 seven outlet multi box and surge protector for $70
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not out of date like some have ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, not out of date like some have said. I personally use it everyday, I walk into my office and boom my light is on everything is recharged. I can turn off lights and computers from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: This had so much promise in the early days of smart home technology. It's dependent on obsolete control methods. Impossible to setup without a computer and the remote app is only available for iOS. Wish I would've returned it when I had the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Vampran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Never knew a power strip could be so useful. well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Morrison

customer_reviews.title: ... I didn't pay list ($39) it would have been nice if somewhere on the box it would have said ...
customer_reviews.text: While I didn't pay list ($39) it would have been nice if somewhere on the box it would have said "IOS only", e.g. NO ANDROID. So even at $100.00 off it's nothing but a power strip with a could of USB charging ports
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: worked for about three months ... they have no actual customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk....
customer_reviews.text: Junk...Don't waste your time trying to get this to work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: PVJIM

product_meta.title: Wi-Fi-enabled i-BRIGHT7x 4ft Smart Surge Protector, remotely control power from anywhere with the BRIGHTenergy Cloud app for iPhone
product_meta.description: Size:4 ftThe i-BRIGHT7x Smart Surge Protector is a Wi-Fi-enabled home energy management tool embedded with online scheduling and power consumption metering on the Microsoft Cloud with maximum protection of your data privacy. The i-BRIGHT7x Smart Surge Protector features a sleek design boasting seven outlets (two “always on” and five collectively schedulable), plus two USB charge ports. i-BRIGHT7x has a 802.11n Wi-Fi range extender bonus function built-in, allowing the Smart Surge Protector to maximize your Wi-Fi coverage in your home or workplace and save up to $200 on a Wi-Fi extender. i-BRIGHT7x connects to the BRIGHTenergy cloud system through your Wi-Fi network where you can control, set-up multiple devices, and monitor the power consumption from a user-friendly dashboard. Using the BRIGHTenergy system online or on the iPhone, you can schedule your power to turn on and off automatically, or remotely turn on or off at any time, from anywhere, with a single touch. By eliminating unnecessary device standby power, you can save up to $100 within 12 months, according to the U.S. Department of Energy. The i-BRIGHT7x is the ideal power accessory for your home, office, entertainment center, garage or kid's room. Designed to support power loads up to 1875 watts and 3150 Joules surge protection, and manufactured with approval of FCC and ETL, the i-BRIGHT7x provides energy management control and maximum surge protection, all with a single touch.
feature_bullets: Turn power on and off automatically according to a schedule, or remotely via the BRIGHTenergy app for iPhone, available for free in the App Store.
7 outlets total with 5 collectively schedulable and 2 always on, plus 2 USB charge ports, 15 Amps, 1800 watts and 3150 Joules Surge Protection.
Factory built-in 802.11n Wi-Fi range extender to maximize Wi-Fi coverage.
Save up to $100 on your energy bill within 12 months by eliminating standby power.
BRIGHTenergy Cloud system provides 24-hr energy consumption benchmark with free basic account.

specifications.Warranty Description: 1 year product warranty and a $200,000 connected equipment warranty.
